Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Light Arrows#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Small Key#.
